companies.Name: Acorn Adventure

companies.Name: Brightwater Holidays

companies.Name: Contours Holidays

Holidays.Title: Cleveland Way
Holidays.Desc: A 110-mile route across the North York Moors to the coastal town of Filey. Graded moderate to strenuous.

Holidays.Title: Cotswold Way
Holidays.Desc: The 102-mile Costwold Way runs between Bath and Chipping Camden. Graded moderate to strenuous.

Holidays.Title: Cumbria Way
Holidays.Desc: The Cumbria Way follows mainly low-level paths across the Lake District. Graded easy to strenuous.

Holidays.Title: Dales Way
Holidays.Desc: The 84-mile Dales Way offers quality running trails between Ilkley and Bowness. Graded easy to strenuous.

companies.Name: Exodus Travels

Holidays.Desc: Highlights include Mont Blanc and dramatic glaciers. Choose your own dates with a tailormade option.

Holidays.Desc: Stay in family run hotels and auberges. Choose your own dates with a tailormade option.

Holidays.Desc: A challenging trek visiting 3 countries in one week. Choose your own dates with a tailormade option.

companies.Name: Explore Worldwide

companies.Description: Explore Worldwide offer an extensive range of walking, cycling, cultural, wildlife and adventure holidays.

Holidays.Title: Cycling Coast to Coast
Holidays.Desc: A challenging ride across England from the Lake District to the North Sea. 3 nights. E-bikes available.

Holidays.Title: Cycle the Cathar Castles
Holidays.Desc: A moderate to challenging ride from Carcassonne to Perpignan. 7 nights. E-bikes available.

Holidays.Title: Canal du Midi
Holidays.Desc: A gentle route along the Canal du Midi, southwest France. Includes visits to historic towns. 7 nights.

Holidays.Title: Loire Valley Cycling
Holidays.Desc: A gentle and relaxed ride through France's beautiful Loire Valley. 7 nights. E-bikes available.

Holidays.Title: Velo en Provence
Holidays.Desc: Ride through Provence and discover the landscape that inspired Vincent van Gogh. 7 nights. E-bikes available.

Holidays.Title: Cycle Marseille to Barcelona
Holidays.Desc: Explore the Mediterranean coastline between Marseille and Barcelona. 7 nights. E-bikes available.

Holidays.Title: Cycle Southern Spain: Murcia
Holidays.Desc: Discover Murcia's whitewashed villages and Moorish towers. 6 nights. E-bikes available.

Holidays.Title: Pyrenees to the Med
Holidays.Desc: A scenic ride from the foothills of the Pyrenees to the Mediterranean coast. 7 nights.

Holidays.Title: Cycle the Camino de Santiago
Holidays.Desc: Follow the route of ancient pilgrims across northern Spain to Santiago de Compostela. 7 nights.

Holidays.Title: Andalucia by Bike
Holidays.Desc: Explore the diversity of Andalucia and visit cities such as Seville and Granada. 12 nights. E-bikes available.

Holidays.Title: Azores Island Hopping
Holidays.Desc: Explore five contrasting islands of the archipelago on this easy to moderately challenging walk.

Holidays.Title: Walking in the Eastern Algarve
Holidays.Desc: Based in the historic town of Tavira, this trip offers scenic coastal and inland walking. Easy grade. 7 nights.

Holidays.Title: Remote Coastal Trails of Portugal

Holidays.Title: Family Finland Summer Adventure
Holidays.Desc: An action packed family activity holiday where you can enjoy rafting, canoeing and hiking.

Holidays.Title: Family Finland Winter Adventure
Holidays.Desc: A family activity short break that includes husky sledding, snowshoeing and a snowmobile safari.

Holidays.Title: Cycle Seville to Porto
Holidays.Desc: From Andalucia, through Extremedura, across the border to Portugal, finishing with a train ride to Porto. 7 nights.

Holidays.Title: Cycle Portugal - Lisbon to Algarve
Holidays.Desc: A cycling adventure travelling south from Lisbon through wild coastal landscapes. 7 nights.

Holidays.Title: Cycle Sardinia
Holidays.Desc: The south-west of Sardinia offers unpoilt beauty with dramatic coastlines and inviting beaches. 7 nights.

Holidays.Title: Levada Trails of Madeira
Holidays.Desc: Walk along ancient paths and the network of irrigation channels known as levadas. 7 nights.

Holidays.Title: Hiking on La Gomera and Tenerife
Holidays.Desc: Explore the pretty island of La Gomera and the volcanic El Teide National Park on Tenerife. Moderate grade. 7 nights.

Holidays.Title: Walking in Lanzarote
Holidays.Desc: An easy to moderate grade walking holiday exploring the best of Lanzarote's unique landscape. 7 nights.

Holidays.Title: Active Romania Adventure
Holidays.Desc: A family activity holiday in the land of Dracula, with biking, hiking and kayaking. 7 nights.

Holidays.Title: Romanian Winter Adventure
Holidays.Desc: A short family winter activity break in the Transylvanian Alps, with sledging and winter survival lessons. 5 nights.

Holidays.Desc: A self-guided walk through dramatic scenery around Fort Augustus, Foyers and Loch Ness. 6 nights.

Holidays.Desc: A self-guided ride combining the Scottish Highlands with visits to famous local distilleries. 7 nights.

Holidays.Desc: Walk through Killarney National Park and enjoy the panoramic views of mountains and lakes.

Holidays.Title: Unspoilt Ring of Kerry Cycling
Holidays.Desc: Get away from the crowds and enjoy the beautiful scenery on this Ring of Kerry cycling holiday.

Holidays.Desc: Enjoy scenic routes shadowed by stunning mountains on the Connemara peninsula in west Ireland. 8 nights.

Holidays.Desc: A self-guided cycling holiday using traffic-free lanes. Visit chateaux such as Chambord and Chenonceau. 8 nights.

Holidays.Desc: Relaxed, self-guided walking through gentle, rolling landscapes with forests, farms and vineyards. 8 nights.

Holidays.Desc: Self-guided walking route offering a mix of vineyard tracks, hilltop trails and woodland paths. 6 nights.

Holidays.Title: Chablis Vineyards Cycling
Holidays.Desc: Gentle, relaxed self-guided cycling on unspoilt routes with wine-tasting opportunities at Chablis. 4 or 6 nights.
